query.statement:
SELECT MANDT, PAPRYYYYMM, TEMNM, ZZACTSS, LIFNR, LIFNRNM, TEMNO, NAMET2 , CNT , IMPTCNT , EVAL_GRADE , POINTAVG , TOT , EVAL_GRADE_SUM , CNT_SUM , POINTAVG_SUM , TOT_SUM , DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY CASE WHEN TOT_SUM IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TOT_SUM END desc) AS RANKING FROM ( SELECT MANDT, PAPRYYYYMM, TEMNM, ZZACTSS, LIFNR, LIFNRNM, TEMNO, NAMET2 , CNT , IMPTCNT , EVAL_GRADE , POINTAVG , TOT , EVAL_GRADE_SUM , CNT_SUM , dec(DEC(nullif(EVAL_GRADE_SUM,0),10,1)/nullif(CNT_SUM,0),10,1) AS POINTAVG_SUM , dec(dec(nullif(EVAL_GRADE_SUM,0)/nullif(CNT_SUM,0),10,1)/ CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) ,10,1) AS TOT_SUM FROM ( SELECT E.MANDT, E.PAPRYYYYMM , (SELECT N.DTEXT4 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE N WHERE N.MANDT = E.MANDT AND N.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND N.LANG = 'ko' AND N.CODE2 = W.ZZACTSS) AS TEMNM , (SELECT MM028.CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE MM028 WHERE MM028.MANDT = E.MANDT AND MM028.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND MM028.LANG = 'ko' AND MM028.CODE2 = W.ZZACTSS) ZZACTSS , E.LIFNR AS LIFNR , (SELECT DISTINCT NN.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0034 NN WHERE NN.MANDT = E.MANDT AND NN.LIFNR = E.LIFNR AND NN.GBN = 'A') AS LIFNRNM , E.TEMNO , (SELECT NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0002 WHERE MANDT = E.MANDT AND TEMNO = E.TEMNO) AS NAMET2 , CASE WHEN E.CNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE E.CNT END AS CNT , CASE WHEN E.IMPTCNT IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE E.IMPTCNT END AS IMPTCNT , CASE WHEN E.EVAL_GRADE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE E.EVAL_GRADE END AS EVAL_GRADE , E.POINTAVG AS POINTAVG , E.TOT AS TOT , SUM(E.EVAL_GRADE) OVER (PARTITION BY E.LIFNR, E.TEMNO ORDER BY E.LIFNR, E.TEMNO ) AS EVAL_GRADE_SUM , SUM(E.CNT) OVER (PARTITION BY E.LIFNR, E.TEMNO ORDER BY E.LIFNR, E.TEMNO ) AS CNT_SUM FROM ( SELECT MANDT, PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO , SUM(CHKCNT) AS CNT , SUM(EVAL_IMNO) AS IMPTCNT , SUM(EVAL_GRADE) AS EVAL_GRADE , dec(nullif(SUM(EVAL_GRADE),0)/nullif(SUM(CHKCNT),0),10,1) AS POINTAVG , dec(dec(nullif(SUM(EVAL_GRADE),0)/nullif(SUM(CHKCNT),0),10,1)/ CAST(REPLACE(#VAR1#, ' ', '') AS DOUBLE) ,10,1) AS TOT FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT , SUBSTR(A.CHKDAT,1,6) AS PAPRYYYYMM , Left(A.POSID, 6) , A.POSID , M02.LIFNR --업체번호 , M02.TEMNO2 AS TEMNO , SUM(A.EVAL_IMNO) AS EVAL_IMNO , SUM(A.EVAL_GRADE) AS EVAL_GRADE , COUNT(*) AS CHKCNT FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1902 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 M02 ON M02.MANDT = A.MANDT AND M02.POSID = Left(A.POSID, 6) AND M02.POSID_1 = A.POSID -- LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0002 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND M02.TEMNO2 = B.TEMNO AND B.DELEF = '' WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND (substr(A.CHKDAT,1,6) BETWEEN #YYYYMMF# AND #YYYYMMT#)
AND M02.TEMNO2 = #ZTEMNO#
AND M02.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND A.ZZGUBUN = #CHK_GBN3#
AND A.ZZGUBUN = #CHK_GBN3# AND SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'S'
GROUP BY A.MANDT, SUBSTR(A.CHKDAT,1,6), M02.LIFNR, M02.TEMNO2, Left(A.POSID, 6), A.POSID ) GROUP BY MANDT, PAPRYYYYMM, LIFNR, TEMNO ) AS E INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0034 AS C ON E.MANDT = C.MANDT AND E.LIFNR = C.LIFNR AND C.GBN = 'A' AND (C.SO = 'X' OR C.SO3 = 'X') INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0002 KK ON E.MANDT = KK.MANDT AND E.LIFNR = KK.LIFNR AND E.TEMNO = KK.TEMNO AND KK.DELEF = '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 W ON E.MANDT = W.MANDT AND E.LIFNR = W.LIFNR WHERE 1=1 AND (W.ZZACTSS IS NOT NULL OR W.ZZACTSS != '') AND (E.TEMNO IS NOT NULL AND E.TEMNO != '' AND E.TEMNO != ' ') AND C.SO5 <> 'X'
AND (C.EL_INDC = 'X' OR (C.EL_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND E.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
AND (C.ES_INDC = 'X' OR (C.ES_INDC = 'X' AND C.ES_INDC = 'X')) AND E.LIFNR <> '0000008001'
AND W.ZZACTSS IN ( SELECT CODE2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = E.MANDT AND CODE1 = 'PS003' AND LANG = 'ko' AND DTEXT3 = #TEMNO# )
AND W.ZZACTSS IN ( SELECT CODE2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = E.MANDT AND CODE1 = 'PS003' AND LANG = 'ko' AND DTEXT3 = #TEMNO# )
AND W.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
) ) FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
